season_window.notes: Opening 2025 slate in renovated Condron Ballpark after 2024 CWS runner-up finish.

ballpark.name: Condron Family Ballpark
ballpark.recent_upgrades: Enhanced player nutrition center and pitching lab in summer 2024.

head_coach.name: Kevin O'Sullivan
head_coach.playing_style: Power pitching, launch-angle heavy offense, heavy analytics integration.
head_coach.recent_quotes: Told GatorSports in Sept 2024 that bullpen usage will lean on 'matchup pods' with two closers.

nil_operations.recent_initiatives: Expanded baseball-specific membership tier with exclusive fall scrimmage streams (Sept 2024).

historical_context.program_trend: Sustained national-title push anchored by elite recruiting and NIL backing.

intel_notes.summary: Condron Ballpark pitching lab now hosts shared biomechanics sessions with softball program twice weekly.

data_quality.next_actions: Need updated roster status after 2024 MLB Draft; validate staff adjustments (Singer consultant role).
